name: False Alarm (Purple Clam)
description:
Hi! This is my entry for the 2022.1 Brackeys Game Jam. I tried to focus more on the aesthetic rather than on finding an innovative idea for this one. I know it's really short and probably quite buggy but I'd love to hear your feedback! Hope you enjoy :D

Controls:

Move: <- -> / A D

Jump: X / Space / Up

Attack: C

Interact: C
